00015 class WeightOutputter
00016         : public DataCommonNeuronVisitor
00017 {
00018 protected:
00020     typedef void * InitValue;
00022     WeightOutputter(InitValue) {}
00023 public:
00025 
00027     unsigned nb_outputs_for_neuron(NeuronInterface * const nrn) {
00028         unsigned count = 0;
00029         // retrieve the list of post-synapses and counts them
00030         nrn->apply_visitor(*this);
00031         if (postsyn_list_pointer())
00032             for (DataCommonNeuronVisitor::ListPostSynType::const_iterator i = postsyn_list_pointer()->begin();
00033                     i != postsyn_list_pointer()->end();
00034                     ++i)
00035                 ++count;
00036         reset();
00037         return count;
00038     }
00039 
00041 
00047     template <class FileWrapper>
00048     inline void operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop
00049                           , NeuronInterface * const nrn
00050                           , FileWrapper * const file_wrapper) {
00051         // to retrieve the list of post-synapses
00052         nrn->apply_visitor(*this);
00053         // go through the list of post-synapses
00054         if (postsyn_list_pointer())
00055             for (DataCommonNeuronVisitor::ListPostSynType::const_iterator i = postsyn_list_pointer()->begin();
00056                     i != postsyn_list_pointer()->end();
00057                     ++i)
00058                 file_wrapper->write_to_file((*i)->weight());
00059         // reinitialise the visitor (sets the spike_time_list_pointer to 0)
00060         reset();
00061     }
00062 
00064 
00066     template <class FileWrapper>
00067     inline void export_connectivity(NeuronInterface * const nrn, FileWrapper * const file_wrapper, int pre_post) {
00068         unsigned count = 0;
00069         // retrieve the id of the post-neurons of post-synapses
00070         nrn->apply_visitor(*this);
00071         if (postsyn_list_pointer())
00072             for (DataCommonNeuronVisitor::ListPostSynType::const_iterator i = postsyn_list_pointer()->begin();
00073                     i != postsyn_list_pointer()->end();
00074                     ++i)
00075                 if (pre_post == 0)
00076                     file_wrapper->write_to_file(nrn->id());
00077                 else
00078                     file_wrapper->write_to_file((*i)->post_nrn().id());
00079         reset();
00080     }
00081 };
